Taisho-era Student Cloak Outfit Set (Black, Men)

A 3-piece set consisting of clothes with a cloak attached, a cap, and shoes of a Japanese student in the Taisho era.
Defensive Strength: ★
Youth Level: ★★★
This set includes the following items:

- Taisho-era Student Cap (Black, Men) (Head)
- Taisho-era Student Clothes & Cloak (Black, Men) (Outfits)
- Taisho-era Student Shoes (Black, Men) (Feet)

* Upon purchase, each item will be added to the applicable category.[#Legal]
